entry.title: Charcoal Handmade Cold Processed Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 290.00

“Where the alchemy of nature meets the artistry of human hands.”

Our handmade cold processed soaps are inspired from a journey that transformed the way we perceive nature and surrendering ourselves to its age-old wisdom. Immersing in the alchemy of nature, learning to discern the language of leaves, the secrets held within roots, and the healing essence of wildflowers. These handmade soaps remind us that the alchemy of herbalism is not merely a craft but a communion, a bridge between the wisdom of the nature and the nurturing hands that shape it.

Our Charcoal handmade cold processed soap holds the purifying power of activated Charcoal powder and the moisturizing properties of oils that makes a invigorating blend which gives this soap its cleansing and detoxifying quality.

#Wisdomofages : A healing wonder from ashes, charcoal metaphorically leaves its mark for ages as a natural cleanser.

Our Soaps are Handmade with fresh All-natural ingredients using cold process soapmaking. NO harmful chemicals or preservative.

-Vegan

-Natural

-Cold process

-No synthetic preservatives

Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Coconut Oil, Kokum butter, Activated Charcoal Powder, Essential oils of Vetiver, Rosemary & Frankincense.

Weight : 100 gm

Shelf Life : Best before 24 months

Neem Wood Comb Set of 2 – Natural Hair Care for Every Hair Type

Nurture Your Scalp with Nature’s Touch

Discover the age-old wisdom of hair care with Almitra Sustainables’ Neem Wood Comb Pack, featuring a wide-tooth comb and a fine-tooth comb — perfect for all hair types and styling needs. Handcrafted from 100% natural neem wood, this duo not only detangles hair gently but also promotes healthy scalp circulation and minimizes static, breakage, and dandruff.

Neem is known for its antibacterial and antifungal properties, making this comb set a natural choice for a cleaner, healthier scalp. Unlike plastic combs, neem wood combs are biodegradable, non-toxic, and eco-friendly, making them an ideal swap for sustainable living.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Two-in-One Combo: Includes one wide-tooth comb for detangling & one fine-tooth comb for styling
  • Natural Neem Wood: Known for antimicrobial benefits & scalp stimulation
  • Gentle on Hair: Reduces hair fall, static, and frizz
  • Plastic-Free & Sustainable: 100% biodegradable and zero-waste alternative
  • Handcrafted in India: Supporting local artisans & ethical production

Ideal For:

  • Daily hair care for men, women & children
  • Curly, wavy, straight & frizz-prone hair
  • Ayurvedic and chemical-free lifestyle seekers
  • Sustainable gifting

Upgrade your grooming essentials with this nature-inspired duo — because healthy hair starts with a conscious comb.

entry.title: Eco-Friendly Coconut Fiber Dry Body Brush with Bamboo Handle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 399.00

Coconut Fiber Dry Body Brush – Natural Exfoliation for Radiant Skin

Gently Detox. Deeply Renew. Sustainably Made.

Discover the power of nature with our Coconut Fiber Dry Body Brush, crafted using ethically sourced coir bristles and a smooth, ergonomic bamboo handle. This 100% biodegradable brush is perfect for dry brushing – a centuries-old wellness ritual that supports lymphatic drainage, improves circulation, and gently exfoliates dead skin to reveal your natural glow.

Why You'll Love It

  • All-Natural & Vegan – Made from coir (coconut husk) and sustainably harvested bamboo.
  • Skin Detox Ritual – Perfect for pre-shower dry brushing to boost circulation and reduce ingrown hairs.
  • Plastic-Free & Compostable – An ideal addition to your zero-waste skincare routine.
  • Ergonomic Design – Smooth, sturdy handle with a cotton rope loop for easy hanging and grip.
  • Gentle Yet Effective – Stimulates skin without being harsh or scratchy.

How to Use

Use on dry skin before bathing. Start from your feet and brush upward toward the heart using long, firm strokes. Avoid sensitive areas. Follow with a nourishing body oil or moisturizer.

Perfect For

  • Conscious consumers who love eco-luxury wellness tools
  • Anyone embracing sustainable skincare and zero-waste living
  • Those seeking a natural alternative to synthetic brushes

entry.title: .Bamboo Toothbrush - Charcoal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 170.00

If you are looking for a greener alternative to a Plastic Toothbrush then there’s nothing better than a Bamboo Charcoal Toothbrush.

Why?

1) Bamboo is a natural resource and is 100% biodegradeable

2) Bamboo has naturally antimicrobial properties, more durable than plastic which makes it a great toothbrush.

3) The bristles are made of 100% Bamboo Fibre and infused with activated charcoal. Charcoal has antimicrobial properties which helps reduce bacteria and plaque activity in the mouth removing extrinsic stains, keeping your teeth clean and beautiful.

4) FDA approved.

*Size – 18.5 cms

*Material – Plant-based, Bristles:Infused with Activated Charcoal.

*Care – Dry it after each use and let it get some air, store it in a well-ventilated space. Change after every two months.

*Disposal – after the toothbrush wears out you can remove the bristles and dispose it into a compost bin or it can be used for various cleaning purposes, or get creative like putting in your garden plant stake to identify your plants.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

Said that now its time to make a switch to greener and healthier alternative.
